title: Mastering Chemical Reaction Conditions: Gamification-Based Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational chemical reaction theory and ability to interpret chemical formulas
context.additional_context: 5-10 minute micro-lessons in smartphone-based mobile environments, aiming to help professional workers understand chemistry concepts applicable to their duties

learning_goals: Explain the difference between stoichiometric and non-stoichiometric conditions in chemical reactions with 80% accuracy
Learners can generate three or more analogical examples metaphorically representing response conditions.
Learners can share created examples with peer learners via a mobile platform and provide feedback at least twice.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
